Title: Kano Killing: Death toll rises to seven
Summary: Suspected assailants reportedly killed a housewife and her four children, including an infant child . The number of casualties in the gruesome killings of members of one family in a Kano community has risen to seven, the Kano Police Command confirmed .

Title: Uba Sani presents bill for mandatory life skills education in Kaduna
Summary: Kaduna State Government has announced plans to present an executive bill to the State House of Assembly . It seeks to make ‘life skills education’ a compulsory and permanent part of secondary secondary education .

Title: Tinubu returns to Nigeria after Abu Dhabi summit
Summary: President Bola Tinubu returned to Nigeria on Saturday after leading the country’s delegation to the Abu Dhabi Sustainability Week 2026 (ADSW 2026) in the United Arab Emirates . A statement issued by Special Adviser on Information and Strategy, Bayo Onanuga, explained .

Title: Uganda’s Museveni wins seventh term as observers denounce intimidation
Summary: Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni won a seventh term in office on Saturday after an election marred by violence and an internet shutdown . African observers say arrests and abductions had “instilled fear’s’, African observers said . Observers said arrests, abductions and internet shutdown had ‘inst

Title: CSO urges Rivers Assembly to adhere to rule of law in impeachment bid against Fubara
Summary: CSO urges Rivers Assembly to adhere to rule of law in impeachment bid against Fubara . National Vanguard for Democratic Coalition (NVDC) insists due process must not be compromised . NVDC urges Rivers State House of Assembly to strictly adhere to constitutional provisions .

Title: Trump threatens European nations with tariffs until US can acquire Greenland
Summary: Trump's threats against Washington's NATO partners would create unprecedented tension within the alliance . If realized, the threats would create a new tension within NATO . The threat would be unprecedentedly unprecedented .

Title: Fire destroys over 100 thatched houses in Monguno IDP camp
Summary: A fire outbreak has destroyed more than 100 thatched houses at the Water Board IDP Camp in Monguno, Borno, police command says .

Title: Why we disconnected power supply to FCT Water Board – AEDC
Summary: Abuja Electricity Distribution Plc (AEDC) disconnected electricity supply to the Federal Capital Territory Water Board following repeated failures to pay bills stretching over a year . AEDC said it disconnected power supply to FCT Water Board due to repeated failure of bills .

Title: Hoodlums kill housewife, six children in Kano
Summary: Yet-to-be-identified hoodlums kill housewife, Fatima Abubakar, and her six children in Kano . The housewife and six children were killed in the attack . The incident occurred in Dorayi Charanchi Quarters in the ancient city .

Title: AFCON 2025: Live Updates [Second Half] – Egypt 0-0 Nigeria
Summary: Action is underway at the Stade Mohammed V, with a bronze medal and a podium finish at stake in the AFCON 2025 third-place play-off .
